Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Zia's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Zia somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which she subsequently joined. Zia aided her group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. While investigating a warehouse, Zia and Leo start talking about Negan when suddenly they alerted to the presence of Michonne and Rosita who are hiding behind some shelves. When Leo is killed before he can head to Sanctuary with the truck full of horn blares in order to divert the herd outside the compound, Zia escapes the warehouse after overpowering Michonne to complete the mission on her own. As she drives down the road, she gets hit by Daryl and Tara who are in another truck. Daryl then shoots her in the head to finish her off.
Death[]: Killed By Tara Chambler (Caused) Daryl Dixon While Zia escapes in her truck, Daryl and Tara use a garbage truck to hit her and making her to crash. Daryl then shoots her in the head.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Zia has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Appearances[]: " The King, the Widow, and Rick "
Trivia[]: Zia is the last character whose death was caused by Tara Chambler in the TV Series .
Name: Zia
